Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowFarCursor.png"
wait(3) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

local fuseSound = Instance.new("Sound") fuseSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11565378" fuseSound.Parent = script.Parent fuseSound:Play()
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") local rocket = script.Parent
force.Parent = rocket local colors = {Vector3.new(1,0,0), Vector3.new(0,1,0), Vector3.new(0,0,1), Vector3.new(1, .5, 0), Vector3.new(0, .5, 1), Vector3.new(1,0,1), Vector3.new(.1, .1, .1), Vector3.new(1,1,0), Vector3.new(0,1,1)}
function onCharacterBlownUp(part, distance, creator) if part.Name == "Head" then local humanoid = part.Parent.Humanoid tagHumanoid(humanoid, creator) end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, creator) if creator ~= nil then local tag = creator:clone() tag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(tag, 1) end end
for i=1,14 do force.force = rocket.CFrame.lookVector * rocket:GetMass() * 98 * -3 wait(.1) end
force:Remove()
local c = colors[math.random(1,#colors)] local c2 = colors[math.random(1, #colors)] local c3 = colors[math.random(1, #colors)] local c4 = colors[math.random(1, #colors)] local c5 = colors[math.random(1, #colors)] local c6 = colors[math.random(1, #colors)] local rad = 10 local vel = 50 local rocketPos = rocket.Position
local sparkleList = {}
local fireworkFactor = (math.random()-.5)*4 + 1
print(fireworkFactor)
for j = 0,14 do for k = 1, 2 do local p = Instance.new("Part") p.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)
p.Transparency = 1 p.CanCollide = true
angle = (j*2+k) * math.pi / 10 p.Position = rocket.Position + Vector3.new(math.sin(angle)*rad, 1, math.cos(angle)*rad) p.Velocity = rocket.Velocity
local s = Instance.new("Fire") s.Color = Color3.new(c) if k == 2 then s.Color = Color3.new(c2) end s.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(colors[math.random(1, #colors)]) s.Parent = p table.insert(sparkleList, s)
local f = Instance.new("BodyForce") f.force = Vector3.new(0,180,0) f.Parent = p
tanVect = Vector3.new(rocketPos.X - p.Position.X, 0, rocketPos.Z - p.Position.Z).unit p.Velocity = tanVect:Cross(Vector3.new(0,1,0))*vel if k == 2 then p.Velocity = fireworkFactor * p.Velocity end p.Parent = game.Workspace local debris = game:GetService("Debris") debris:AddItem(p, 7) end end
function updateParticles(time) for a = 0, 14 do for b = 1, 2 do mySpark = sparkleList[a*2+b] if mySpark ~= nil then if mySpark.Parent then mySpark.Parent.BodyForce.force = ((rocketPos - mySpark.Parent.Position)*Vector3.new(1,0,1)).unit * vel*vel/rad + Vector3.new(0, 240, 0) end if b == 1 then newColor = c*(1-time) + c3*time mySpark.Color = Color3.new(newColor.X, newColor.Y, newColor.Z) else newColor = c2*(1-time) + c4*time mySpark.Color = Color3.new(newColor.X, newColor.Y, newColor.Z) end end end end end
function updateParticles2(time) for a = 0, 14 do for b = 1, 2 do mySpark = sparkleList[a*2+b] if mySpark ~= nil then if mySpark.Parent then mySpark.Parent.BodyForce.force = ((rocketPos - mySpark.Parent.Position)*Vector3.new(1,0,1)).unit * vel*vel/rad + Vector3.new(0, 240, 0) end if b == 1 then newColor = c3*(1-time) + c5*time mySpark.Color = Color3.new(newColor.X, newColor.Y, newColor.Z) else newColor = c4*(1-time) + c6*time mySpark.Color = Color3.new(newColor.X, newColor.Y, newColor.Z) end end end end end
local sound = Instance.new("Sound") sound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\Rocket shot.wav" sound.Parent = script.Parent sound.Volume = 1 sound:play()
local e = Instance.new("Explosion") e.BlastRadius = 3 e.BlastPressure = 150000 e.Position = rocket.Position local creator = script.Parent:findFirstChild("creator") if creator ~= nil then e.Hit:connect(function(part, distance) onCharacterBlownUp(part, distance, creator) end) end e.Parent = game.Workspace rocket.Transparency = 1 for i = 1, 30 do updateParticles(i/20) wait(.1) end rocket:Remove() for i = 1, 30 do updateParticles2(i/20) wait(.1) end

local Tool = script.Parent local Rocket = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter
function plant(pos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
local bomb = Tool.Handle:Clone() bomb.CanCollide = true bomb.Transparency = 0 bomb.Position = pos bomb.Name = "Shell" bomb.Locked = true
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = bomb
bomb.Parent = game.Workspace local newScript = Tool.BlastScript:clone() newScript.Disabled = false newScript.Parent = bomb end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1 plant(Tool.Handle.Position) wait(5) Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)
